System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("System.Windows.Forms.Design.TableLayoutPanelCodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 代表會在資料列和資料行所組成的方格中動態配置其內容的面板。

span.span: Represents a panel that dynamically lays out its contents in a grid composed of rows and columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會在格線中排列其內容。The control arranges its contents in a grid. 由於配置會在設計階段和執行階段執行，因此當應用程式環境變更時，配置也會隨著動態變更。Because the layout is performed both at design time and run time, it can change dynamically as the application environment changes. 這可讓面板中的控制項按比例調整大小，以便回應變更 (例如，由於當地語系化所造成的父控制項調整大小或文字長度變更)。This gives the controls in the panel the ability to proportionally resize, so it can respond to changes such as the parent control resizing or text length changing due to localization. 任何 Windows Form 控制項都可以是 控制項的子系，包括 的其他執行個體。Any Windows Forms control can be a child of the control, including other instances of . 這可讓您建構複雜的配置，配合在執行階段的變化。This allows you to construct sophisticated layouts that adapt to changes at runtime. 根據 、 和 屬性的值， 控制項可以展開，以在新控制項加入時加以容納。The control can expand to accommodate new controls when they are added, depending on the value of the , , and properties. 將 或 屬性設定為值 0，可指定對應方向的 將解除繫結。Setting either the or property to a value of 0 specifies that the will be unbound in the corresponding direction. 您也可以在 控制項已完全充滿子控制項之後，控制展開的方向 (水平或垂直)。You can also control the direction of expansion (horizontal or vertical) after the control is full of child controls. 控制項預設會向下加入資料列來展開。By default, the control expands downward by adding rows. 如果您希望資料列和資料行的行為不同於預設的行為，就可以使用 和 屬性來控制資料列和資料行的屬性。If you want rows and columns that behave differently from the default behavior, you can control the properties of rows and columns by using the and properties. 您可以個別設定資料列或資料行的屬性。You can set the properties of rows or columns individually. 控制項會將下列屬性加入其子控制項：`Cell`、`Column`、`Row`、`ColumnSpan` 和 `RowSpan`。The control adds the following properties to its child controls: `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan`. 您可以設定子控制項的 `ColumnSpan` 或 `RowSpan` 屬性，來合併 控制項中的儲存格。You can merge cells in the control by setting the `ColumnSpan` or `RowSpan` properties on a child control. > [!NOTE] > 若要設定`Cell`， `Column`， `Row`， `ColumnSpan`，並`RowSpan`屬性，在執行階段，使用， ， ， ，和方法。To set the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the , , , , and methods. > > 讀取`Cell`， `Column`， `Row`， `ColumnSpan`，並`RowSpan`屬性在執行階段，使用， ， ， ，以及方法。To read the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the , , , , and methods. 子控制項的停駐行為等同於其他容器控制項。The docking behavior of child controls is the same as other container controls. 中的子控制項的錨定行為不同於其他容器控制項中的行為。The anchoring behavior of child controls in a differs from the behavior in other container controls. 如果子控制項的值屬性設定為或、 將放置控制項，對儲存格左或右框線的距離，這是控制項的總和屬性和面板屬性。If the value of the child control's property is set to or , the control will be placed against the left or right border of the cell, at a distance that is the sum of the control's property and the panel's property. 如果兩個並設定值，控制項將會位於資料格的寬度大小包含和納入考量的值。If both the and values are set, the control will be sized to the width of the cell, with the and values taken into account. 行為和相當錨定。The behavior for and anchoring is analogous. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 錨定和停駐 TableLayoutPanel 控制項中的子控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Anchor and Dock Child Controls in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md). 如果您需要的子控制項，來模擬其他容器控制項中的預設錨定行為，您可以調整和屬性，以維護控制項的框線與儲存格的框線之間的固定距離。If you need a child control to mimic the default anchoring behavior in other container controls, you can adjust the and properties to maintain a constant distance between the control's border and the cell's border. 設定的值`Column`並`Row`為-1 的子控制項的屬性會移到中的第一個空白儲存格控制項控制項。Setting the values of both the `Column` and `Row` properties of a child control to -1 will cause the control to be moved to the first empty cell in the control. 從左到右及從上到下，將會繼續搜尋服務中選擇的空資料格。The empty cell will be chosen in a search that proceeds from left to right and from top to bottom. 此順序是文化特性，而定，以便正常運作中由右至左 (RTL) 配置。This order is dependent on the culture, so it will behave correctly in right-to-left (RTL) layouts. > [!NOTE] > 唯一的控制項具有屬性設定為`true`參與控制項的版面配置計算。Only controls that have the property set to `true` participate in the control's layout computations. 另請參閱：Also see: - [操作說明：在 TableLayoutPanel 控制項中對齊和縮放控制項How to: Align and Stretch a Control in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-align-and-stretch-a-control-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md) - [操作說明：擴展 TableLayoutPanel 控制項中的資料列和資料行How to: Span Rows and Columns in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-span-rows-and-columns-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md) - [操作說明：編輯 TableLayoutPanel 控制項中的資料行和資料列How to: Edit Columns and Rows in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-edit-columns-and-rows-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md) - [逐步解說：使用 TableLayoutPanel 排列 Windows Forms 上的控制項Walkthrough: Arranging Controls on Windows Forms Using a TableLayoutPanel](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-a-tablelayoutpanel.md) ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法用來建立自訂資料格的外觀。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to create a custom appearance for a cell. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`TableLayoutPanel1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TableLayoutPanel1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#561](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#561)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#561](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#561)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ColumnCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ColumnCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定資料表中的資料行數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of columns in the table.

value.span: 控制項中的資料行數目。

span.span: The number of columns in the control.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以同時指定兩者而已知且固定數目的資料格的版面配置的屬性。You can specify both the and the properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells. 您也可以指定一個屬性或其他如果您預期的資料格數目在配置中成長，但前提屬性容許這種成長。You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the property allows for such growth. 如果的值為 0，則 [面板] 中將會在成長加入資料列，而且如果的值是 0，則 [面板] 中將會在成長加入資料行。If the value of is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns. 指定使用的面板成長屬性是設定慣用或為 0，不過。Specifying panel growth with the property is preferred to setting or to 0, however. 控制項可以新增或刪除資料表使用屬性。Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnStyles As TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection

summary.span: 取得 之資料行樣式的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of column styles for the .

value.span: ，包含 控制項中每一個資料行的 。

span.span: A containing a for each column in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取特定的資料行的樣式屬性。Use the property to access the style properties of specific columns. 您可以使用的成員類別來設定資料表中的個別資料行的特性。You can use members of the class to set the characteristics of individual columns in the table. 當控制項來排列其資料行，它會將優先順序指派給每個順序如下：When the control arranges its columns, it assigns priorities to each in the following order: 1. 資料行設定為會被視為第一和其固定的寬度配置。Columns with set to are considered first, and their fixed widths are allocated. 2. 資料行設定為的大小，以其內容。Columns with set to are sized to their contents. 3. 剩餘的空間會分配給資料行設定為。Remaining space is divided among columns with set to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定每個資料行的屬性時按下。The following code example sets the properties of each column when a is clicked. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`control`跨越兩個或多個資料行，方法會傳回最小的資料行索引。If `control` spans two or more columns, the method will return the lowest column index. 資料行位置值是以零為起始，因此您可以使用它做為索引所傳回的陣列針對。The column position value is zero based, so you can use it as an index for the array returned by . 這個方法會呼叫`Column`面板在設計階段加入其子控制項的屬性。This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. 若要取得的實際位置`control`，取決於它的位置時，即使，呼叫方法。To get the actual position of `control`, even when its position is determined by , call the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例列舉中的所有子控制項，並為每個控制項中尋找的資料行索引方法。The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the and finds the column index for each control using the method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跨越資料行通常很有用，大幅超出其對等控制項的定位。Column spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably wider than its peers. 這個方法會呼叫`ColumnSpan`面板在設計階段加入其子控制項的屬性。This method is called by the `ColumnSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用並方法來設定的寬度控制中。The following code example uses the and methods to set the width of a control in a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行和資料列的位置值是以零為起始。The column and row position values are zero based. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例列舉中的所有儲存格位置迴圈的資料行和所指定的資料列來並，然後呼叫方法來擷取在每個資料格控制項。The following code example enumerates all the cell positions in the by looping through the columns and rows given by and , and then calling the method to retrieve the control at each cell. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回實際的目前位置`control`，即使其位置取決於。The method returns the actual current position of `control`, even if its position is determined by the . 這個方法會考量整個控制項狀態，包括資料行或資料列跨越及何時已放置的控制項及其`Column`和`Row`屬性設為-1。This method takes into account the entire control state, including column or row spanning and when the has placed a control with its `Column` and `Row` properties set to -1. 這相當於情況和會傳回-1。This is equivalent to the situation in which and return -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`control`跨越兩個或多個資料列，方法會傳回最小的資料列索引。If `control` spans two or more rows, the method will return the lowest row index. 資料列位置值是以零為起始，因此您可以使用它做為索引所傳回的陣列針對。The row position value is zero based, so you can use it as an index for the array returned by . 這個方法會呼叫`Row`面板在設計階段加入其子控制項的屬性。This method is called by the `Row` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. 若要取得的實際位置`control`，取決於它的位置時，即使，呼叫方法。To get the actual position of `control`, even when its position is determined by , call the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例列舉中的所有子控制項並為每個找到的資料列索引方法。The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the and finds the row index for each using the method. span.span: is not a type that can be arranged by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跨越資料列通常很有用，高度明顯大於其對等控制項的定位。Row spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably taller than its peers. 這個方法會呼叫`RowSpan`面板在設計階段加入其子控制項的屬性。This method is called by the `RowSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用並方法來設定的寬度控制中。The following code example uses the and methods to set the width of a control in a . summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出當佔用所有現有的儲存格時， 控制項是否應該擴充來容納新的儲存格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should expand to accommodate new cells when all existing cells are occupied.
A indicating the growth scheme.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項預設會向下加入資料列來展開。By default, the control expands downward by adding rows. > [!NOTE] > 如果嘗試將控制項加入至全文控制項，以及值是，然後就會擲回。If an attempt is made to add a control to a full control, and the value of is , then an is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設定的值取決於所選屬性。The following code example sets the value of the property depending on the selected . 在執行的階段，當使用者按一下 [標記] 按鈕**測試 GrowStyle**，則控制項加入至控制項。At run time, when the user clicks on the button labeled **Test GrowStyle**, a control is added to the control. 如果控制項已滿、 藉由加入資料列或資料行，它會展開或便會產生例外狀況，值而定。If the control is full, it expands by adding a row or column, or it raises an exception, depending on the value of . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RowCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.RowCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定資料表中的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows in the table.

value.span: 控制項中的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows in the control.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以同時指定兩者而已知且固定數目的資料格的版面配置的屬性。You can specify both the and the properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells. 您也可以指定一個屬性或其他如果您預期的資料格數目在配置中成長，但前提屬性容許這種成長。You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the property allows for such growth. 如果的值為 0，則 [面板] 中將會在成長加入資料列，而且如果的值是 0，則 [面板] 中將會在成長加入資料行。If the value of is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns. 指定使用的面板成長屬性是設定慣用或為 0，不過。Specifying panel growth with the property is preferred to setting or to 0, however. 控制項可以新增或刪除資料表使用屬性。Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowStyles As TableLayoutRowStyleCollection

summary.span: 取得 之資料列樣式的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of row styles for the .

value.span: ，包含 控制項中每一個資料列的 。

span.span: A containing a for each row in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取特定的資料列的樣式屬性。Use the property to access the style properties of specific rows. 您可以使用的成員類別來設定資料表中的個別資料列的特性。You can use members of the class to set the characteristics of individual rows in the table. 當排列它的資料列，它會將優先順序指派給每個順序如下：When the control arranges its rows, it assigns priorities to each in the following order: 1. 資料列設定為會被視為第一個和其固定的高度會配置。Rows with set to are considered first, and their fixed heights are allocated. 2. 資料列設定為的大小，以其內容。Rows with set to are sized to their contents. 3. 剩餘的空間會分配的資料列設定為。Remaining space is divided among rows with set to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性的每個資料列時按下。The following code example sets the properties of each row when a is clicked. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將控制項移到另一個資料行。The method moves the control to another column in the . 資料行和資料列的以零為起始的索引。The columns and rows have zero-based indexes. 將資料行位置設定為-1 指定控制項會流動至第一個空白資料格。Setting the column position to -1 specifies that the control will flow to the first empty cell. 這個方法會重新套用資料表配置中的所有控制項。This method reapplies the table layout to all controls in the . 這個方法會呼叫`Column`面板在設計階段加入其子控制項的屬性。This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法來交換兩個控制項包含在控制項。The following code example uses the method to swap two controls contained within a control. 此範例假設至少兩個資料列的控制。The example assumes a control with at least two rows. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#12)]
